title: Two including 6-year-old girl killed in Middeniya shooting, one injured
byline: Two persons including man and his 6-year-old daughter have been killed following a shooting incident near the Kadewatta Junction in Middeniya.

title: Misty conditions expected during the morning
byline: The Department of Meteorology says that showers or thundershowers may occur at several places in Galle, Matara, Kaluthara and Rathnapura districts in the evening or night.

title: Pope Francis has double pneumonia, complicating his treatment, Vatican says
byline: Pope Francis has the onset of double pneumonia, the Vatican said on Tuesday, complicating treatment for the 88-year pontiff and indicating a further deterioration in his fragile health.

title: Sri Lanka’s manufacturing and services sectors expand in January 2025
byline: Sri Lanka’s Purchasing Managers’ Index (PMI) for January 2025 recorded growth in both manufacturing and services sectors.

title: Committee to address surgical waiting lists in govt. hospitals
byline: A special discussion between Secretary to the President Dr. Nandika Sanath Kumanayake and the heads of the health sector was held on Tuesday (18) at the Presidential Secretariat.
